积分表

(一) 含有 ax+bax+bax+b 的积分​

  1. ∫dxax+b=1aln⁡∣ax+b∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax+b} = \frac{1}{a} \ln |ax+b| + C∫ax+bdx​=a1​ln∣ax+b∣+C

  2. ∫(ax+b)μdx=1a(μ+1)(ax+b)μ+1+C(μ≠−1)\int (ax+b)^{\mu} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a(\mu+1)} (ax+b)^{\mu+1} + C \quad (\mu \neq -1)∫(ax+b)μdx=a(μ+1)1​(ax+b)μ+1+C(μ=−1)

  3. ∫xax+bdx=1a2(ax+b−bln⁡∣ax+b∣)+C\int \frac{x}{ax+b} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2} \left(ax + b - b \ln |ax+b| \right) + C∫ax+bx​dx=a21​(ax+b−bln∣ax+b∣)+C

  4. ∫x2ax+bdx=1a3[12(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2ln⁡∣ax+b∣]+C\int \frac{x^2}{ax+b} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^3} \left[ \frac{1}{2} (ax+b)^2 - 2b (ax+b) + b^2 \ln |ax+b| \right] + C∫ax+bx2​dx=a31​[21​(ax+b)2−2b(ax+b)+b2ln∣ax+b∣]+C

  5. ∫dxx(ax+b)=−1bln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x(ax+b)} = -\frac{1}{b} \ln \left| \frac{ax+b}{x} \right| + C∫x(ax+b)dx​=−b1​ln​xax+b​​+C

  6. ∫dxx2(ax+b)=−1bx+ab2ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2(ax+b)} = -\frac{1}{bx} + \frac{a}{b^2} \ln \left| \frac{ax+b}{x} \right| + C∫x2(ax+b)dx​=−bx1​+b2a​ln​xax+b​​+C

  7. ∫x(ax+b)2dx=1a2(ln⁡∣ax+b∣+bax+b)+C\int \frac{x}{(ax+b)^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2} \left( \ln |ax+b| + \frac{b}{ax+b} \right) + C∫(ax+b)2x​dx=a21​(ln∣ax+b∣+ax+bb​)+C

  8. ∫x2(ax+b)2dx=1a3(ax+b−2bln⁡∣ax+b∣−b2ax+b)+C\int \frac{x^2}{(ax+b)^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^3} \left(ax + b - 2b \ln |ax+b| - \frac{b^2}{ax+b} \right) + C∫(ax+b)2x2​dx=a31​(ax+b−2bln∣ax+b∣−ax+bb2​)+C

  9. ∫dxx(ax+b)2=1b(ax+b)−1b2ln⁡∣ax+bx∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x(ax+b)^2} = \frac{1}{b(ax+b)} - \frac{1}{b^2} \ln \left| \frac{ax+b}{x} \right| + C∫x(ax+b)2dx​=b(ax+b)1​−b21​ln​xax+b​​+C

(二) 含有 ax+b\sqrt{ax+b}ax+b​ 的积分​

  1. ∫ax+b dx=23a(ax+b)3+C\int \sqrt{ax+b} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2}{3a} \sqrt{(ax+b)^3} + C∫ax+b​dx=3a2​(ax+b)3​+C

  2. ∫xax+b dx=215a2(3ax−2b)(ax+b)3+C\int x \sqrt{ax+b} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2}{15a^2} (3ax - 2b) \sqrt{(ax+b)^3} + C∫xax+b​dx=15a22​(3ax−2b)(ax+b)3​+C

  3. ∫x2ax+b dx=2105a3(15a2x2−12abx+8b2)(ax+b)3+C\int x^2 \sqrt{ax+b} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2}{105a^3} (15a^2 x^2 - 12abx + 8b^2) \sqrt{(ax+b)^3} + C∫x2ax+b​dx=105a32​(15a2x2−12abx+8b2)(ax+b)3​+C

  4. ∫xax+b dx=23a2(ax−2b)ax+b+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{ax+b}} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2}{3a^2} (ax - 2b) \sqrt{ax+b} + C∫ax+b​x​dx=3a22​(ax−2b)ax+b​+C

  5. ∫x2ax+b dx=215a3(3a2x2−4abx+8b2)ax+b+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{ax+b}} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2}{15a^3} (3a^2 x^2 - 4abx + 8b^2) \sqrt{ax+b} + C∫ax+b​x2​dx=15a32​(3a2x2−4abx+8b2)ax+b​+C

  6. ∫dxxax+b={1bln⁡∣ax+b−bax+b+b∣+C(b>0)2−barctan⁡(ax+b−b)+C(b<0)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{ax+b}} = \begin{cases} \frac{1}{\sqrt{b}} \ln \left| \frac{\sqrt{ax+b} - \sqrt{b}}{\sqrt{ax+b} + \sqrt{b}} \right| + C & (b > 0) \\ \frac{2}{\sqrt{-b}} \arctan \left( \sqrt{\frac{ax+b}{-b}} \right) + C & (b < 0) \end{cases}∫xax+b​dx​=⎩⎨⎧​b​1​ln​ax+b​+b​ax+b​−b​​​+C−b​2​arctan(−bax+b​​)+C​(b>0)(b<0)​

  7. ∫dxx2ax+b=−ax+bbx−a2b∫dxxax+b\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 \sqrt{ax+b}} = -\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{bx} - \frac{a}{2b} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{ax+b}}∫x2ax+b​dx​=−bxax+b​​−2ba​∫xax+b​dx​

  8. ∫ax+bx dx=2ax+b+b∫dxxax+b\int \frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x} \, \mathrm{d} x = 2 \sqrt{ax+b} + b \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{ax+b}}∫xax+b​​dx=2ax+b​+b∫xax+b​dx​

  9. ∫ax+bx2 dx=−ax+bx+a2∫dxxax+b\int \frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{\sqrt{ax+b}}{x} + \frac{a}{2} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{ax+b}}∫x2ax+b​​dx=−xax+b​​+2a​∫xax+b​dx​

(三) 含有 x2±a2x^2 \pm a^2x2±a2 的积分​

  1. ∫dxx2+a2=1aarctan⁡xa+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 + a^2} = \frac{1}{a} \arctan \frac{x}{a} + C∫x2+a2dx​=a1​arctanax​+C

  2. ∫dx(x2+a2)n=x2(n−1)a2(x2+a2)n−1+2n−32(n−1)a2∫dx(x2+a2)n−1\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{(x^2 + a^2)^n} = \frac{x}{2(n-1)a^2(x^2 + a^2)^{n-1}} + \frac{2n-3}{2(n-1)a^2} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{(x^2 + a^2)^{n-1}}∫(x2+a2)ndx​=2(n−1)a2(x2+a2)n−1x​+2(n−1)a22n−3​∫(x2+a2)n−1dx​

  3. ∫dxx2−a2=12aln⁡∣x−ax+a∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 - a^2} = \frac{1}{2a} \ln \left| \frac{x-a}{x+a} \right| + C∫x2−a2dx​=2a1​ln​x+ax−a​​+C

(四) 含有 ax2+b(a>0)ax^2 + b \quad (a > 0)ax2+b(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxax2+b={1abarctan⁡abx+C(b>0)12−abln⁡∣ax−−bax+−b∣+C(b<0)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + b} = \begin{cases} \frac{1}{\sqrt{ab}} \arctan \sqrt{\frac{a}{b}} x + C & (b > 0) \\ \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{-ab}} \ln \left| \frac{\sqrt{a} x - \sqrt{-b}}{\sqrt{a} x + \sqrt{-b}} \right| + C & (b < 0) \end{cases}∫ax2+bdx​=⎩⎨⎧​ab​1​arctanba​​x+C2−ab​1​ln​a​x+−b​a​x−−b​​​+C​(b>0)(b<0)​

  2. ∫xax2+bdx=12aln⁡∣ax2+b∣+C\int \frac{x}{ax^2 + b} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{2a} \ln \left| ax^2 + b \right| + C∫ax2+bx​dx=2a1​ln​ax2+b​+C

  3. ∫x2ax2+bdx=xa−ba∫dxax2+b\int \frac{x^2}{ax^2 + b} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{a} - \frac{b}{a} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + b}∫ax2+bx2​dx=ax​−ab​∫ax2+bdx​

  4. ∫dxx(ax2+b)=12bln⁡x2∣ax2+b∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x(ax^2 + b)} = \frac{1}{2b} \ln \frac{x^2}{| ax^2 + b |} + C∫x(ax2+b)dx​=2b1​ln∣ax2+b∣x2​+C

  5. ∫dxx2(ax2+b)=−1bx−ab∫dxax2+b\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 (ax^2 + b)} = -\frac{1}{bx} - \frac{a}{b} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + b}∫x2(ax2+b)dx​=−bx1​−ba​∫ax2+bdx​

  6. ∫dxx3(ax2+b)=a2b2ln⁡∣ax2+b∣x2−12bx2+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^3 (ax^2 + b)} = \frac{a}{2b^2} \ln \frac{| ax^2 + b |}{x^2} - \frac{1}{2bx^2} + C∫x3(ax2+b)dx​=2b2a​lnx2∣ax2+b∣​−2bx21​+C

  7. ∫dx(ax2+b)2=x2b(ax2+b)+12b∫dxax2+b\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{(ax^2 + b)^2} = \frac{x}{2b(ax^2 + b)} + \frac{1}{2b} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + b}∫(ax2+b)2dx​=2b(ax2+b)x​+2b1​∫ax2+bdx​

(五) 含有 ax2+bx+c(a>0)ax^2 + bx + c \quad (a > 0)ax2+bx+c(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxax2+bx+c={24ac−b2arctan⁡(2ax+b4ac−b2)+C(b2<4ac)1b2−4acln⁡∣2ax+b−b2−4ac2ax+b+b2−4ac∣+C(b2>4ac)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + bx + c} = \begin{cases} \frac{2}{\sqrt{4ac - b^2}} \arctan \left( \frac{2ax + b}{\sqrt{4ac - b^2}} \right) + C & (b^2 < 4ac) \\ \frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}} \ln \left| \frac{2ax + b - \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2ax + b + \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}} \right| + C & (b^2 > 4ac) \end{cases}∫ax2+bx+cdx​=⎩⎨⎧​4ac−b2​2​arctan(4ac−b2​2ax+b​)+Cb2−4ac​1​ln​2ax+b+b2−4ac​2ax+b−b2−4ac​​​+C​(b2<4ac)(b2>4ac)​

  2. ∫xax2+bx+cdx=12aln⁡∣ax2+bx+c∣−b2a∫dxax2+bx+c\int \frac{x}{ax^2 + bx + c} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{2a} \ln \left| ax^2 + bx + c \right| - \frac{b}{2a} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{ax^2 + bx + c}∫ax2+bx+cx​dx=2a1​ln​ax2+bx+c​−2ab​∫ax2+bx+cdx​

(六) 含有 x2+a2(a>0)\sqrt{x^2+a^2} \quad (a>0)x2+a2​(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxx2+a2=arshxa+C1=ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{x^2+a^2}} = \text{arsh} \frac{x}{a} + C_1 = \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫x2+a2​dx​=arshax​+C1​=ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  2. ∫dx(x2+a2)3=xa2x2+a2+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{(x^2+a^2)^3}} = \frac{x}{a^2 \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} + C∫(x2+a2)3​dx​=a2x2+a2​x​+C

  3. ∫xx2+a2 dx=x2+a2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} \, \mathrm{d} x = \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} + C∫x2+a2​x​dx=x2+a2​+C

  4. ∫x(x2+a2)3dx=−1x2+a2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{(x^2 + a^2)^3}} \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} + C∫(x2+a2)3​x​dx=−x2+a2​1​+C

  5. ∫x2x2+a2 dx=x2x2+a2−a22ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} - \frac{a^2}{2} \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫x2+a2​x2​dx=2x​x2+a2​−2a2​ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  6. ∫x2(x2+a2)3 dx=−xx2+a2+ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{(x^2 + a^2)^3}} \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} + \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫(x2+a2)3​x2​dx=−x2+a2​x​+ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  7. ∫dxxx2+a2=1aln⁡x2+a2−a∣x∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} = \frac{1}{a} \ln \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2} - a}{|x|} + C∫xx2+a2​dx​=a1​ln∣x∣x2+a2​−a​+C

  8. ∫dxx2x2+a2=−x2+a2a2x+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}} = -\frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}}{a^2 x} + C∫x2x2+a2​dx​=−a2xx2+a2​​+C

  9. ∫x2+a2 dx=x2x2+a2+a22ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫x2+a2​dx=2x​x2+a2​+2a2​ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  10. ∫(x2+a2)3 dx=x8(2x2+5a2)x2+a2+38a4ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \sqrt{(x^2 + a^2)^3} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} (2x^2 + 5a^2) \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} + \frac{3}{8} a^4 \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫(x2+a2)3​dx=8x​(2x2+5a2)x2+a2​+83​a4ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  11. ∫xx2+a2 dx=13(x2+a2)3+C\int x \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{3} \sqrt{(x^2 + a^2)^3} + C∫xx2+a2​dx=31​(x2+a2)3​+C

  12. ∫x2x2+a2 dx=x8(2x2+a2)x2+a2−a48ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int x^2 \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} (2x^2 + a^2) \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} - \frac{a^4}{8} \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫x2x2+a2​dx=8x​(2x2+a2)x2+a2​−8a4​ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

  13. ∫x2+a2x dx=x2+a2+aln⁡x2+a2−a∣x∣+C\int \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}}{x} \, \mathrm{d} x = \sqrt{x^2 + a^2} + a \ln \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2} - a}{|x|} + C∫xx2+a2​​dx=x2+a2​+aln∣x∣x2+a2​−a​+C

  14. ∫x2+a2x2 dx=−x2+a2x+ln⁡(x+x2+a2)+C\int \frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}}{x^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{\sqrt{x^2 + a^2}}{x} + \ln(x + \sqrt{x^2 + a^2}) + C∫x2x2+a2​​dx=−xx2+a2​​+ln(x+x2+a2​)+C

(七) 含有 x2−a2(a>0)\sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \quad (a > 0)x2−a2​(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxx2−a2=x∣x∣arch∣x∣a+C1=ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} = \frac{x}{|x|} \text{arch} \frac{|x|}{a} + C_1 = \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫x2−a2​dx​=∣x∣x​archa∣x∣​+C1​=ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  2. ∫dx(x2−a2)3=−xa2x2−a2+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\left( \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right)^3} = - \frac{x}{a^2 \sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} + C∫(x2−a2​)3dx​=−a2x2−a2​x​+C

  3. ∫xx2−a2dx=x2−a2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} \mathrm{d} x = \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} + C∫x2−a2​x​dx=x2−a2​+C

  4. ∫x(x2−a2)3dx=−1x2−a2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{(x^2 - a^2)^3}} \mathrm{d} x = - \frac{1}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} + C∫(x2−a2)3​x​dx=−x2−a2​1​+C

  5. ∫x2x2−a2dx=x2x2−a2+a22ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫x2−a2​x2​dx=2x​x2−a2​+2a2​ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  6. ∫x2(x2−a2)3dx=−xx2−a2+ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \frac{x^2}{\left( \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right)^3} \mathrm{d} x = - \frac{x}{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} + \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫(x2−a2​)3x2​dx=−x2−a2​x​+ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  7. ∫dxxx2−a2=1aarccosa∣x∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} = \frac{1}{a} \text{arccos} \frac{a}{|x|} + C∫xx2−a2​dx​=a1​arccos∣x∣a​+C

  8. ∫dxx2x2−a2=x2−a2a2x+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 \sqrt{x^2 - a^2}} = \frac{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}}{a^2 x} + C∫x2x2−a2​dx​=a2xx2−a2​​+C

  9. ∫x2−a2dx=x2x2−a2−a22ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} - \frac{a^2}{2} \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫x2−a2​dx=2x​x2−a2​−2a2​ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  10. ∫(x2−a2)3 dx=x8(2x2−5a2)x2−a2+38a4ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \sqrt{(x^2 - a^2)^3} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} \left(2x^2 - 5a^2\right) \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} + \frac{3}{8} a^4 \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫(x2−a2)3​dx=8x​(2x2−5a2)x2−a2​+83​a4ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  11. ∫xx2−a2 dx=13(x2−a2)3+C\int x \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{3} \sqrt{(x^2 - a^2)^3} + C∫xx2−a2​dx=31​(x2−a2)3​+C

  12. ∫x2x2−a2 dx=x8(2x2−a2)x2−a2−a48ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int x^2 \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} \left(2x^2 - a^2\right) \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} - \frac{a^4}{8} \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫x2x2−a2​dx=8x​(2x2−a2)x2−a2​−8a4​ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

  13. ∫x2−a2x dx=x2−a2−aarccos⁡a∣x∣+C\int \frac{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}}{x} \, \mathrm{d} x = \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} - a \arccos \frac{a}{|x|} + C∫xx2−a2​​dx=x2−a2​−aarccos∣x∣a​+C

  14. ∫x2−a2x2 dx=−x2−a2x+ln⁡∣x+x2−a2∣+C\int \frac{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}}{x^2} \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{\sqrt{x^2 - a^2}}{x} + \ln \left| x + \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \right| + C∫x2x2−a2​​dx=−xx2−a2​​+ln​x+x2−a2​​+C

(八) 含有 a2−x2(a>0)\sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \quad (a > 0)a2−x2​(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxa2−x2=arcsin⁡xa+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫a2−x2​dx​=arcsinax​+C

  2. ∫dx(a2−x2)3=xa2a2−x2+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\left( \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \right)^3} = \frac{x}{a^2 \sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} + C∫(a2−x2​)3dx​=a2a2−x2​x​+C

  3. ∫xa2−x2dx=−a2−x2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} \mathrm{d} x = -\sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫a2−x2​x​dx=−a2−x2​+C

  4. ∫x(a2−x2)3dx=1a2−x2+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{(a^2 - x^2)^3}} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} + C∫(a2−x2)3​x​dx=a2−x2​1​+C

  5. ∫x2a2−x2dx=−x2a2−x2+a22arcsin⁡xa+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫a2−x2​x2​dx=−2x​a2−x2​+2a2​arcsinax​+C

  6. ∫x2(a2−x2)3dx=xa2−x2−arcsin⁡xa+C\int \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{(a^2 - x^2)^3}} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} - \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫(a2−x2)3​x2​dx=a2−x2​x​−arcsinax​+C

  7. ∫dxxa2−x2=1aln⁡a−a2−x2∣x∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = \frac{1}{a} \ln \frac{a - \sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{|x|} + C∫xa2−x2​dx​=a1​ln∣x∣a−a2−x2​​+C

  8. ∫dxx2a2−x2=−a2−x2a2x+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x^2 \sqrt{a^2 - x^2}} = -\frac{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{a^2 x} + C∫x2a2−x2​dx​=−a2xa2−x2​​+C

  9. ∫a2−x2dx=x2a2−x2+a22arcsin⁡xa+C\int \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + \frac{a^2}{2} \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫a2−x2​dx=2x​a2−x2​+2a2​arcsinax​+C

  10. ∫(a2−x2)3dx=x8(5a2−2x2)a2−x2+38a4arcsin⁡xa+C\int \sqrt{\left( a^2 - x^2 \right)^3} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} \left( 5a^2 - 2x^2 \right) \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + \frac{3}{8} a^4 \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫(a2−x2)3​dx=8x​(5a2−2x2)a2−x2​+83​a4arcsinax​+C

  11. ∫xa2−x2dx=−13(a2−x2)3+C\int x \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{1}{3} \sqrt{\left( a^2 - x^2 \right)^3} + C∫xa2−x2​dx=−31​(a2−x2)3​+C

  12. ∫x2a2−x2dx=x8(2x2−a2)a2−x2+a48arcsin⁡xa+C\int x^2 \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{8} (2x^2 - a^2) \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + \frac{a^4}{8} \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫x2a2−x2​dx=8x​(2x2−a2)a2−x2​+8a4​arcsinax​+C

  13. ∫a2−x2xdx=a2−x2+aln⁡a−a2−x2∣x∣+C\int \frac{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{x} \mathrm{d} x = \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + a \ln \frac{a - \sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{|x|} + C∫xa2−x2​​dx=a2−x2​+aln∣x∣a−a2−x2​​+C

  14. ∫a2−x2x2dx=−a2−x2x−arcsin⁡xa+C\int \frac{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{x^2} \mathrm{d} x = - \frac{\sqrt{a^2 - x^2}}{x} - \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + C∫x2a2−x2​​dx=−xa2−x2​​−arcsinax​+C

(九) 含有 ±ax2+bx+c(a>0)\sqrt{\pm ax^2 + bx + c} \quad (a > 0)±ax2+bx+c​(a>0) 的积分​

  1. ∫dxax2+bx+c=1aln⁡∣2ax+b+2aax2+bx+c∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c}} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{a}} \ln \left| 2ax + b + 2 \sqrt{a} \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} \right| + C∫ax2+bx+c​dx​=a​1​ln​2ax+b+2a​ax2+bx+c​​+C

  2. ∫ax2+bx+cdx=2ax+b4aax2+bx+c+4ac−b28a3ln⁡∣2ax+b+2aax2+bx+c∣+C\int \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2ax + b}{4a} \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} + \frac{4ac - b^2}{8 \sqrt{a^3}} \ln \left| 2ax + b + 2 \sqrt{a} \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} \right| + C∫ax2+bx+c​dx=4a2ax+b​ax2+bx+c​+8a3​4ac−b2​ln​2ax+b+2a​ax2+bx+c​​+C

  3. ∫xax2+bx+cdx=1aax2+bx+c−b2a3ln⁡∣2ax+b+2aax2+bx+c∣+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c}} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a} \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} - \frac{b}{2 \sqrt{a^3}} \ln \left| 2ax + b + 2 \sqrt{a} \sqrt{ax^2 + bx + c} \right| + C∫ax2+bx+c​x​dx=a1​ax2+bx+c​−2a3​b​ln​2ax+b+2a​ax2+bx+c​​+C

  4. ∫dxc+bx−ax2=1aarcsin⁡2ax−bb2+4ac+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{c + bx - ax^2}} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{a}} \arcsin \frac{2ax - b}{\sqrt{b^2 + 4ac}} + C∫c+bx−ax2​dx​=a​1​arcsinb2+4ac​2ax−b​+C

  5. ∫c+bx−ax2dx=2ax−b4ac+bx−ax2+b2+4ac8a3arcsin⁡2ax−bb2+4ac+C\int \sqrt{c + bx - ax^2} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2ax - b}{4a} \sqrt{c + bx - ax^2} + \frac{b^2 + 4ac}{8 \sqrt{a^3}} \arcsin \frac{2ax - b}{\sqrt{b^2 + 4ac}} + C∫c+bx−ax2​dx=4a2ax−b​c+bx−ax2​+8a3​b2+4ac​arcsinb2+4ac​2ax−b​+C

  6. ∫xc+bx−ax2dx=−1ac+bx−ax2+b2a3arcsin⁡2ax−bb2+4ac+C\int \frac{x}{\sqrt{c + bx - ax^2}} \mathrm{d} x = - \frac{1}{a} \sqrt{c + bx - ax^2} + \frac{b}{2 \sqrt{a^3}} \arcsin \frac{2ax - b}{\sqrt{b^2 + 4ac}} + C∫c+bx−ax2​x​dx=−a1​c+bx−ax2​+2a3​b​arcsinb2+4ac​2ax−b​+C

(十) 含有 ±x−ax−b\sqrt{\pm \frac{x-a}{x-b}}±x−bx−a​​ 或 (x−a)(b−x)\sqrt{(x-a)(b-x)}(x−a)(b−x)​ 的积分​

  1. ∫x−ax−b dx=(x−b)x−ax−b+(b−a)ln⁡(∣x−a∣+∣x−b∣)+C\int \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{x-b}} \, \mathrm{d} x = (x-b) \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{x-b}} + (b-a) \ln \left( \sqrt{|x-a|} + \sqrt{|x-b|} \right) + C∫x−bx−a​​dx=(x−b)x−bx−a​​+(b−a)ln(∣x−a∣​+∣x−b∣​)+C

  2. ∫x−ab−x dx=(x−b)x−ab−x+(b−a)arcsin⁡x−ab−a+C\int \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{b-x}} \, \mathrm{d} x = (x-b) \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{b-x}} + (b-a) \arcsin \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{b-a}} + C∫b−xx−a​​dx=(x−b)b−xx−a​​+(b−a)arcsinb−ax−a​​+C

  3. ∫dx(x−a)(b−x)=2arcsin⁡x−ab−a+C(a<b)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sqrt{(x-a)(b-x)}} = 2 \arcsin \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{b-a}} + C \quad (a < b)∫(x−a)(b−x)​dx​=2arcsinb−ax−a​​+C(a<b)

  4. ∫(x−a)(b−x) dx=2x−a−b4(x−a)(b−x)+(b−a)24arcsin⁡x−ab−a+C(a<b)\int \sqrt{(x-a)(b-x)} \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{2x-a-b}{4} \sqrt{(x-a)(b-x)} + \frac{(b-a)^2}{4} \arcsin \sqrt{\frac{x-a}{b-a}} + C \quad (a < b)∫(x−a)(b−x)​dx=42x−a−b​(x−a)(b−x)​+4(b−a)2​arcsinb−ax−a​​+C(a<b)

(十一) 含有三角函数的积分​

  1. ∫sin⁡x dx=−cos⁡x+C\int \sin x \, \mathrm{d} x = -\cos x + C∫sinxdx=−cosx+C

  2. ∫cos⁡x dx=sin⁡x+C\int \cos x \, \mathrm{d} x = \sin x + C∫cosxdx=sinx+C

  3. ∫tan⁡x dx=−ln⁡∣cos⁡x∣+C\int \tan x \, \mathrm{d} x = -\ln | \cos x | + C∫tanxdx=−ln∣cosx∣+C

  4. ∫cot⁡x dx=ln⁡∣sin⁡x∣+C\int \cot x \, \mathrm{d} x = \ln | \sin x | + C∫cotxdx=ln∣sinx∣+C

  5. ∫sec⁡x dx=ln⁡∣tan⁡(π4+x2)∣+C=ln⁡∣sec⁡x+tan⁡x∣+C\int \sec x \, \mathrm{d} x = \ln \left| \tan \left( \frac{\pi}{4} + \frac{x}{2} \right) \right| + C = \ln | \sec x + \tan x | + C∫secxdx=ln​tan(4π​+2x​)​+C=ln∣secx+tanx∣+C

  6. ∫csc⁡x dx=ln⁡∣tan⁡x2∣+C=ln⁡∣csc⁡x−cot⁡x∣+C\int \csc x \, \mathrm{d} x = \ln \left| \tan \frac{x}{2} \right| + C = \ln | \csc x - \cot x | + C∫cscxdx=ln​tan2x​​+C=ln∣cscx−cotx∣+C

  7. ∫sec⁡2x dx=tan⁡x+C\int \sec^2 x \, \mathrm{d} x = \tan x + C∫sec2xdx=tanx+C

  8. ∫csc⁡2x dx=−cot⁡x+C\int \csc^2 x \, \mathrm{d} x = -\cot x + C∫csc2xdx=−cotx+C

  9. ∫sec⁡xtan⁡x dx=sec⁡x+C\int \sec x \tan x \, \mathrm{d} x = \sec x + C∫secxtanxdx=secx+C

  10. ∫csc⁡xcot⁡x dx=−csc⁡x+C\int \csc x \cot x \, \mathrm{d} x = -\csc x + C∫cscxcotxdx=−cscx+C

  11. ∫sin⁡2x dx=x2−14sin⁡2x+C\int \sin^2 x \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} - \frac{1}{4} \sin 2x + C∫sin2xdx=2x​−41​sin2x+C

  12. ∫cos⁡2x dx=x2+14sin⁡2x+C\int \cos^2 x \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} + \frac{1}{4} \sin 2x + C∫cos2xdx=2x​+41​sin2x+C

  13. ∫sin⁡nx dx=1nsin⁡n−1xcos⁡x+n−1n∫sin⁡n−2x dx\int \sin^n x \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{n} \sin^{n-1} x \cos x + \frac{n-1}{n} \int \sin^{n-2} x \, \mathrm{d} x∫sinnxdx=n1​sinn−1xcosx+nn−1​∫sinn−2xdx

  14. ∫cos⁡nx dx=1ncos⁡n−1xsin⁡x+n−1n∫cos⁡n−2x dx\int \cos^n x \, \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{n} \cos^{n-1} x \sin x + \frac{n-1}{n} \int \cos^{n-2} x \, \mathrm{d} x∫cosnxdx=n1​cosn−1xsinx+nn−1​∫cosn−2xdx

  15. ∫dxsin⁡nx=−1n−1⋅cos⁡xsin⁡n−1x+n−2n−1∫dxsin⁡n−2x\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sin^n x} = -\frac{1}{n-1} \cdot \frac{\cos x}{\sin^{n-1} x} + \frac{n-2}{n-1} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\sin^{n-2} x}∫sinnxdx​=−n−11​⋅sinn−1xcosx​+n−1n−2​∫sinn−2xdx​

  16. ∫dxcos⁡nx=1n−1⋅sin⁡xcos⁡n−1x+n−2n−1∫dxcos⁡n−2x\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\cos^n x} = \frac{1}{n-1} \cdot \frac{\sin x}{\cos^{n-1} x} + \frac{n-2}{n-1} \int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{\cos^{n-2} x}∫cosnxdx​=n−11​⋅cosn−1xsinx​+n−1n−2​∫cosn−2xdx​

  17. ∫cos⁡mxsin⁡nx dx=1m+ncos⁡m−1xsin⁡n+1x+m−1m+n∫cos⁡m−2xsin⁡nx dx=−1m+ncos⁡m+1xsin⁡n−1x+n−1m+n∫cos⁡mxsin⁡n−2x dx\int \cos^m x \sin^n x \, \mathrm{d} x \\ = \frac{1}{m+n} \cos^{m-1} x \sin^{n+1} x + \frac{m-1}{m+n} \int \cos^{m-2} x \sin^n x \, \mathrm{d} x \\ = -\frac{1}{m+n} \cos^{m+1} x \sin^{n-1} x + \frac{n-1}{m+n} \int \cos^m x \sin^{n-2} x \, \mathrm{d} x∫cosmxsinnxdx=m+n1​cosm−1xsinn+1x+m+nm−1​∫cosm−2xsinnxdx=−m+n1​cosm+1xsinn−1x+m+nn−1​∫cosmxsinn−2xdx

  18. ∫sin⁡axcos⁡bx dx=−12(a+b)cos⁡(a+b)x−12(a−b)cos⁡(a−b)x+C\int \sin ax \cos bx \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{1}{2(a+b)} \cos (a+b)x - \frac{1}{2(a-b)} \cos (a-b)x + C∫sinaxcosbxdx=−2(a+b)1​cos(a+b)x−2(a−b)1​cos(a−b)x+C

  19. ∫sin⁡axsin⁡bx dx=−12(a+b)sin⁡(a+b)x+12(a−b)sin⁡(a−b)x+C\int \sin ax \sin bx \, \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{1}{2(a+b)} \sin (a+b)x + \frac{1}{2(a-b)} \sin (a-b)x + C∫sinaxsinbxdx=−2(a+b)1​sin(a+b)x+2(a−b)1​sin(a−b)x+C

  20. ∫cos⁡axcos⁡bxdx=12(a+b)sin⁡(a+b)x+12(a−b)sin⁡(a−b)x+C\int \cos ax \cos bx\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{2(a+b)}\sin (a+b)x + \frac{1}{2(a-b)}\sin (a-b)x + C∫cosaxcosbxdx=2(a+b)1​sin(a+b)x+2(a−b)1​sin(a−b)x+C

  21. ∫dxa+bsin⁡x=2a2−b2arctan⁡atan⁡x2+ba2−b2+C(a2>b2)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a+b\sin x} = \frac{2}{\sqrt{a^2-b^2}} \arctan \frac{a \tan \frac{x}{2} + b}{\sqrt{a^2-b^2}} + C \quad (a^2 > b^2)∫a+bsinxdx​=a2−b2​2​arctana2−b2​atan2x​+b​+C(a2>b2)

  22. ∫dxa+bsin⁡x=1b2−a2ln⁡∣atan⁡x2+b−b2−a2atan⁡x2+b+b2−a2∣+C(a2<b2)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a+b\sin x} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{b^2-a^2}} \ln \left| \frac{a \tan \frac{x}{2} + b - \sqrt{b^2-a^2}}{a \tan \frac{x}{2} + b + \sqrt{b^2-a^2}} \right| + C \quad (a^2 < b^2)∫a+bsinxdx​=b2−a2​1​ln​atan2x​+b+b2−a2​atan2x​+b−b2−a2​​​+C(a2<b2)

  23. ∫dxa+bcos⁡x=2a+ba+ba−barctan⁡(a−ba+btan⁡x2)+C(a2>b2)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a+b\cos x} = \frac{2}{a+b} \sqrt{\frac{a+b}{a-b}} \arctan \left( \sqrt{\frac{a-b}{a+b}} \tan \frac{x}{2} \right) + C \quad (a^2 > b^2)∫a+bcosxdx​=a+b2​a−ba+b​​arctan(a+ba−b​​tan2x​)+C(a2>b2)

  24. ∫dxa+bcos⁡x=1a+ba+bb−aln⁡∣tan⁡x2+a+bb−atan⁡x2−a+bb−a∣+C(a2<b2)\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a+b\cos x} = \frac{1}{a+b} \sqrt{\frac{a+b}{b-a}} \ln \left| \frac{\tan \frac{x}{2} + \sqrt{\frac{a+b}{b-a}}}{\tan \frac{x}{2} - \sqrt{\frac{a+b}{b-a}}} \right| + C \quad (a^2 < b^2)∫a+bcosxdx​=a+b1​b−aa+b​​ln​tan2x​−b−aa+b​​tan2x​+b−aa+b​​​​+C(a2<b2)

  25. ∫dxa2cos⁡2x+b2sin⁡2x=1abarctan⁡(batan⁡x)+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a^2 \cos^2 x + b^2 \sin^2 x} = \frac{1}{ab} \arctan \left( \frac{b}{a} \tan x \right) + C∫a2cos2x+b2sin2xdx​=ab1​arctan(ab​tanx)+C

  26. ∫dxa2cos⁡2x−b2sin⁡2x=12abln⁡∣btan⁡x+abtan⁡x−a∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{a^2 \cos^2 x - b^2 \sin^2 x} = \frac{1}{2ab} \ln \left| \frac{b \tan x + a}{b \tan x - a} \right| + C∫a2cos2x−b2sin2xdx​=2ab1​ln​btanx−abtanx+a​​+C

  27. ∫xsin⁡axdx=1a2sin⁡ax−1axcos⁡ax+C\int x \sin ax \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2} \sin ax - \frac{1}{a} x \cos ax + C∫xsinaxdx=a21​sinax−a1​xcosax+C

  28. ∫x2sin⁡axdx=−1ax2cos⁡ax+2a2xsin⁡ax+2a3cos⁡ax+C\int x^2 \sin ax \mathrm{d} x = -\frac{1}{a} x^2 \cos ax + \frac{2}{a^2} x \sin ax + \frac{2}{a^3} \cos ax + C∫x2sinaxdx=−a1​x2cosax+a22​xsinax+a32​cosax+C

  29. ∫xcos⁡axdx=1a2cos⁡ax+1axsin⁡ax+C\int x \cos ax \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2} \cos ax + \frac{1}{a} x \sin ax + C∫xcosaxdx=a21​cosax+a1​xsinax+C

  30. ∫x2cos⁡axdx=1ax2sin⁡ax+2a2xcos⁡ax−2a3sin⁡ax+C\int x^2 \cos ax \mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a} x^2 \sin ax + \frac{2}{a^2} x \cos ax - \frac{2}{a^3} \sin ax + C∫x2cosaxdx=a1​x2sinax+a22​xcosax−a32​sinax+C

(十二) 含有反三角函数的积分 (其中 a>0a > 0a>0)​

  1. ∫arcsin⁡xadx=xarcsin⁡xa+a2−x2+C\int \arcsin \frac{x}{a} \mathrm{d} x = x \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫arcsinax​dx=xarcsinax​+a2−x2​+C

  2. ∫xarcsin⁡xadx=(x22−a24)arcsin⁡xa+x4a2−x2+C\int x \arcsin \frac{x}{a} \mathrm{d} x = \left( \frac{x^2}{2} - \frac{a^2}{4} \right) \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + \frac{x}{4} \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫xarcsinax​dx=(2x2​−4a2​)arcsinax​+4x​a2−x2​+C

  3. ∫x2arcsin⁡xadx=x33arcsin⁡xa+19(x2+2a2)a2−x2+C\int x^2 \arcsin \frac{x}{a} \mathrm{d} x = \frac{x^3}{3} \arcsin \frac{x}{a} + \frac{1}{9} (x^2 + 2a^2) \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫x2arcsinax​dx=3x3​arcsinax​+91​(x2+2a2)a2−x2​+C

  4. ∫arccos⁡xadx=xarccos⁡xa−a2−x2+C\int \arccos \frac{x}{a} \mathrm{d} x = x \arccos \frac{x}{a} - \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫arccosax​dx=xarccosax​−a2−x2​+C

  5. ∫xarccos⁡xa dx=(x22−a24)arccos⁡xa−x4a2−x2+C\int x \arccos \frac{x}{a} \,\mathrm{d} x = \left( \frac{x^2}{2} - \frac{a^2}{4} \right) \arccos \frac{x}{a} - \frac{x}{4} \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫xarccosax​dx=(2x2​−4a2​)arccosax​−4x​a2−x2​+C

  6. ∫x2arccos⁡xa dx=x33arccos⁡xa−19(x2+2a2)a2−x2+C\int x^2 \arccos \frac{x}{a} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{x^3}{3} \arccos \frac{x}{a} - \frac{1}{9} (x^2 + 2a^2) \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} + C∫x2arccosax​dx=3x3​arccosax​−91​(x2+2a2)a2−x2​+C

  7. ∫arctan⁡xa dx=xarctan⁡xa−a2ln⁡(a2+x2)+C\int \arctan \frac{x}{a} \,\mathrm{d} x = x \arctan \frac{x}{a} - \frac{a}{2} \ln \left( a^2 + x^2 \right) + C∫arctanax​dx=xarctanax​−2a​ln(a2+x2)+C

  8. ∫xarctan⁡xa dx=12(a2+x2)arctan⁡xa−a2x+C\int x \arctan \frac{x}{a} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{2} \left( a^2 + x^2 \right) \arctan \frac{x}{a} - \frac{a}{2} x + C∫xarctanax​dx=21​(a2+x2)arctanax​−2a​x+C

  9. ∫x2arctan⁡xa dx=x33arctan⁡xa−a6x2+a36ln⁡(a2+x2)+C\int x^2 \arctan \frac{x}{a} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{x^3}{3} \arctan \frac{x}{a} - \frac{a}{6} x^2 + \frac{a^3}{6} \ln \left( a^2 + x^2 \right) + C∫x2arctanax​dx=3x3​arctanax​−6a​x2+6a3​ln(a2+x2)+C

(十三) 含有指数函数的积分​

  1. ∫ax dx=1ln⁡aax+C\int a^x \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{\ln a} a^x + C∫axdx=lna1​ax+C

  2. ∫eax dx=1aeax+C\int e^{ax} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a} e^{ax} + C∫eaxdx=a1​eax+C

  3. ∫xeax dx=1a2(ax−1)eax+C\int x e^{ax} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2} (ax - 1) e^{ax} + C∫xeaxdx=a21​(ax−1)eax+C

  4. ∫xneax dx=1axneax−na∫xn−1eax dx\int x^n e^{ax} \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a} x^n e^{ax} - \frac{n}{a} \int x^{n-1} e^{ax} \,\mathrm{d} x∫xneaxdx=a1​xneax−an​∫xn−1eaxdx

  5. ∫xax dx=xln⁡aax−1(ln⁡a)2ax+C\int x a^x \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{\ln a} a^x - \frac{1}{(\ln a)^2} a^x + C∫xaxdx=lnax​ax−(lna)21​ax+C

  6. ∫xnax dx=1ln⁡axnax−nln⁡a∫xn−1ax dx\int x^n a^x \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{\ln a} x^n a^x - \frac{n}{\ln a} \int x^{n-1} a^x \,\mathrm{d} x∫xnaxdx=lna1​xnax−lnan​∫xn−1axdx

  7. ∫eaxsin⁡bx dx=1a2+b2eax(asin⁡bx−bcos⁡bx)+C\int e^{ax} \sin bx \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2 + b^2} e^{ax} (a \sin bx - b \cos bx) + C∫eaxsinbxdx=a2+b21​eax(asinbx−bcosbx)+C

  8. ∫eaxcos⁡bx dx=1a2+b2eax(bsin⁡bx+acos⁡bx)+C\int e^{ax} \cos bx \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2 + b^2} e^{ax} (b \sin bx + a \cos bx) + C∫eaxcosbxdx=a2+b21​eax(bsinbx+acosbx)+C

  9. ∫eaxsin⁡nbx dx=1a2+b2n2eaxsin⁡n−1bx(asin⁡bx−nbcos⁡bx)+n(n−1)b2a2+b2n2∫eaxsin⁡n−2bx dx\int e^{ax} \sin^n bx \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2 + b^2 n^2} e^{ax} \sin^{n-1} bx \left( a \sin bx - n b \cos bx \right) + \frac{n (n-1) b^2}{a^2 + b^2 n^2} \int e^{ax} \sin^{n-2} bx \,\mathrm{d} x∫eaxsinnbxdx=a2+b2n21​eaxsinn−1bx(asinbx−nbcosbx)+a2+b2n2n(n−1)b2​∫eaxsinn−2bxdx

  10. ∫eaxcos⁡nbx dx=1a2+b2n2eaxcos⁡n−1bx(acos⁡bx+nbsin⁡bx)+n(n−1)b2a2+b2n2∫eaxcos⁡n−2bx dx\int e^{ax} \cos^n bx \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{a^2 + b^2 n^2} e^{ax} \cos^{n-1} bx \left( a \cos bx + n b \sin bx \right) + \frac{n (n-1) b^2}{a^2 + b^2 n^2} \int e^{ax} \cos^{n-2} bx \,\mathrm{d} x∫eaxcosnbxdx=a2+b2n21​eaxcosn−1bx(acosbx+nbsinbx)+a2+b2n2n(n−1)b2​∫eaxcosn−2bxdx

(十四) 含有对数函数的积分​

  1. ∫ln⁡x dx=xln⁡x−x+C\int \ln x \,\mathrm{d} x = x \ln x - x + C∫lnxdx=xlnx−x+C

  2. ∫dxxln⁡x=ln⁡∣ln⁡x∣+C\int \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{x \ln x} = \ln |\ln x| + C∫xlnxdx​=ln∣lnx∣+C

  3. ∫xnln⁡x dx=1n+1xn+1(ln⁡x−1n+1)+C\int x^n \ln x \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{n+1} x^{n+1} \left( \ln x - \frac{1}{n+1} \right) + C∫xnlnxdx=n+11​xn+1(lnx−n+11​)+C

  4. ∫(ln⁡x)n dx=x(ln⁡x)n−n∫(ln⁡x)n−1 dx\int (\ln x)^n \,\mathrm{d} x = x (\ln x)^n - n \int (\ln x)^{n-1} \,\mathrm{d} x∫(lnx)ndx=x(lnx)n−n∫(lnx)n−1dx

  5. ∫xm(ln⁡x)n dx=1m+1xm+1(ln⁡x)n−nm+1∫xm(ln⁡x)n−1 dx\int x^m (\ln x)^n \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{1}{m+1} x^{m+1} (\ln x)^n - \frac{n}{m+1} \int x^m (\ln x)^{n-1} \,\mathrm{d} x∫xm(lnx)ndx=m+11​xm+1(lnx)n−m+1n​∫xm(lnx)n−1dx

(十五) 含有双曲函数的积分​

  1. ∫sh⁡x dx=ch⁡x+C\int \operatorname{sh} x \,\mathrm{d} x = \operatorname{ch} x + C∫shxdx=chx+C

  2. ∫ch⁡x dx=sh⁡x+C\int \operatorname{ch} x \,\mathrm{d} x = \operatorname{sh} x + C∫chxdx=shx+C

  3. ∫th⁡x dx=ln⁡ch⁡x+C\int \operatorname{th} x \,\mathrm{d} x = \ln \operatorname{ch} x + C∫thxdx=lnchx+C

  4. ∫sh⁡2x dx=−x2+14sh⁡2x+C\int \operatorname{sh}^2 x \,\mathrm{d} x = -\frac{x}{2} + \frac{1}{4} \operatorname{sh} 2x + C∫sh2xdx=−2x​+41​sh2x+C

  5. ∫ch⁡2x dx=x2+14sh⁡2x+C\int \operatorname{ch}^2 x \,\mathrm{d} x = \frac{x}{2} + \frac{1}{4} \operatorname{sh} 2x + C∫ch2xdx=2x​+41​sh2x+C

(十六) 定积分​

  1. ∫−ππcos⁡nx dx=∫−ππsin⁡nx dx=0\int_{-\pi}^{\pi} \cos nx \,\mathrm{d} x = \int_{-\pi}^{\pi} \sin nx \,\mathrm{d} x = 0∫−ππ​cosnxdx=∫−ππ​sinnxdx=0

  2. ∫−ππcos⁡mxsin⁡nx dx=0\int_{-\pi}^{\pi} \cos mx \sin nx \,\mathrm{d} x = 0∫−ππ​cosmxsinnxdx=0

  3. ∫−ππcos⁡mxcos⁡nx dx={0,m≠n,π,m=n.\int_{-\pi}^{\pi} \cos mx \cos nx \,\mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} 0, & m \neq n, \\ \pi, & m = n. \end{cases}∫−ππ​cosmxcosnxdx={0,π,​m=n,m=n.​

  4. ∫−ππsin⁡mxsin⁡nx dx={0,m≠n,π,m=n.\int_{-\pi}^{\pi} \sin mx \sin nx \,\mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} 0, & m \neq n, \\ \pi, & m = n. \end{cases}∫−ππ​sinmxsinnxdx={0,π,​m=n,m=n.​

  5. ∫0πsin⁡mxsin⁡nx dx=∫0πcos⁡mxcos⁡nx dx={0,m≠n,π2,m=n.\int_{0}^{\pi} \sin mx \sin nx \,\mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{\pi} \cos mx \cos nx \,\mathrm{d} x = \begin{cases} 0, & m \neq n, \\ \frac{\pi}{2}, & m = n. \end{cases}∫0π​sinmxsinnxdx=∫0π​cosmxcosnxdx={0,2π​,​m=n,m=n.​

  6. In=∫0π2sin⁡nx dx=∫0π2cos⁡nx dxI_n = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \sin^n x \, \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{\frac{\pi}{2}} \cos^n x \, \mathrm{d} xIn​=∫02π​​sinnxdx=∫02π​​cosnxdx

    In=n−1nIn−2I_n = \frac{n-1}{n} I_{n-2}In​=nn−1​In−2​

    ={n−1n⋅n−3n−2⋅ ⋯ ⋅45⋅23(n 为大于 1 的正奇数),I1=1,n−1n⋅n−3n−2⋅ ⋯ ⋅34⋅12⋅π2(n 为正偶数),I0=π2.= \begin{cases} \frac{n-1}{n} \cdot \frac{n-3}{n-2} \cdot \, \cdots \, \cdot \frac{4}{5} \cdot \frac{2}{3} & (n \text{ 为大于 }1\text{ 的正奇数}), & I_1 = 1, \\ \frac{n-1}{n} \cdot \frac{n-3}{n-2} \cdot \, \cdots \, \cdot \frac{3}{4} \cdot \frac{1}{2} \cdot \frac{\pi}{2} & (n \text{ 为正偶数}), & I_0 = \frac{\pi}{2}. \end{cases}={nn−1​⋅n−2n−3​⋅⋯⋅54​⋅32​nn−1​⋅n−2n−3​⋅⋯⋅43​⋅21​⋅2π​​(n 为大于 1 的正奇数),(n 为正偶数),​I1​=1,I0​=2π​.​

  • (七) 含有 \sqrt{x^2 - a^2} \quad (a > 0) 的积分
  • (八) 含有 \sqrt{a^2 - x^2} \quad (a > 0) 的积分
  • (九) 含有 \sqrt{\pm ax^2 + bx + c} \quad (a > 0) 的积分
  • (十) 含有 \sqrt{\pm \frac{x-a}{x-b}} 或 \sqrt{(x-a)(b-x)} 的积分
